name: Timeworks (itch)
description:
Timeworks is a silly puzzle game about getting along with yourself. 

Versions of yourself from the past, that is. 

Play through 6 levels of throwing, catching, and stacking to meet your harsh quota.

If the web version is laggy, please download the game below.

TIMEWORKS™ ASSEMBLER MACHINE USER MANUAL

1. Insert pattern card and ingredients 2. Push button 3. Watch your head

This game was made in 8 days for a game jam around the theme "Industrial".

~Copyright Colin Page 2020~
